member.summary: Stop the device.
member.param: if set to true [wait for device to be stopped].

member.name: M:Iisu.IDevice.UpdateFrame(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tells the device to acquire the next frame, if the device is running synchronously, the processing will occure in this method call.
member.param: if this is set to true, the call will block until a new frame is available
member.returns: true if a new frame is available

member.name: M:Iisu.IDevice.ReleaseFrame
member.summary: signifies the device that processing of the current frame is done and release its resources

member.name: M:Iisu.IDevice.LockFrame
member.summary: signifies the device that processing of the current frame is locked for all future UpdateFrame until ReleaseFrame is called

member.param: The command.

member.remarks: non-blocking, does not wait the completion of command. return value can be used for that purpose

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.CreateApplicationLibrary
member.summary: Creates a CommonLibrary object for use from an application, as opposed to from a server.
member.returns: A CommonLibrary object that uses an application mode handle
member.exception: Throws InitException if the library initialization fails.
Throws OpenHandleException if opening the activation api handle fails.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.InitializeLibrary
member.summary: Initialization required to use the activation library and the Activation API.

member.summary: Closes the currently open handle created with OpenClientHandle.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.Cleanup
member.summary: Release the activation library.

member.summary: Gets the latest error for the last operation.
member.returns: Resulting ActivationError.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.GetLastErrorDescription
member.summary: Gets the latest error string for the last operation.
member.returns: String description of the error.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.GetDescriptionForEnum(System.Enum)
member.summary: Get the description string from the enum value.
member.param: An enumeration value. This is not required to have a description defined.
member.returns: The description for the value if available, otherwise the string name of the enum value.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.SetActivationServer(System.String)
member.summary: Stores the address of the activation server to be used for subsequent activation transactions that require a server.
member.param: The address of the activation server. For FlexNet License server use port@host or @host. For FlexNet Operations server use full URL ex: http://servername/page

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.GetActivationServer
member.summary: Returns the address of the activation server to which activation transactions will be sent.
member.returns: The activation server address or NULL if it has not been previously set.

member.summary: Sets the type of communication used for the connection to the activation server used for transactions.
member.param: The type of communication required. Set this in relation to the type of activation server.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.GetCommunicationType
member.summary: Gets the type of communication used for the connection to the activation server.
member.returns: The type of communcations required. Set this in relation to the type of activation server.

member.summary: Sets the callback for status messages.
member.param: The delegate method.
Optional data.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.SetProxy(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Proxy server details for communication to an Operations server.
member.param: The name of the proxy server.
The proxy server port.
Optional user name. Set to null when not required.
Optional password. Set to null when not required.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.flxActCommonLibraryInit(System.String)
member.summary: Initialization required to use the activation library and the Activation API.
member.param: The path and file name for the activation library. When set to NULL, the default value is used.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.flxActCommonHandleOpen(System.IntPtr@,FlexNet.ActivationModes,FlexNet.ActivationError@)
member.summary: Creates an Activation API handle.
member.param: The resulting pointer to the newly opened Activation API handle.
Defines the mode in which the activation utility using this handle executes.
Resulting error code, if any.
member.returns: Returns True on success and False on Failure. On Failure details are in the error parameter.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.flxActCommonHandleClose(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Closes an activation handle.
member.param: An activation handle opened with flxActCommonHandleOpen
member.returns: True on success and False on failure.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.flxActCommonLibraryCleanup
member.summary: Release the activation library.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.flxActCommonHandleGetError(System.IntPtr,FlexNet.ActivationError@)
member.summary: Gets the latest error code for the last operation performed using the specified handle.
member.param: An activation handle opened with flxActCommonHandleOpen
Resulting error code, if any.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.flxActCommonHandleSetRemoteServer(System.IntPtr,System.String)
member.summary: Stores the address of the activation server to be used for subsequent activation transactions that require a server.
member.param: An activation handle opened with flxActCommonHandleOpen.
The address of the activation server.
member.returns: Returns True on success and False on failure. On failure call flxActCommonHandleGetError to find out the specific error.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.flxActCommonHandleGetRemoteServer(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Returns the address of the activation server to which activation transactions will be sent.
member.param: An activation handle opened with flxActCommonHandleOpen.
member.returns: The activation server address or NULL if it has not been previously set.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.flxActCommonHandleSetCommType(System.IntPtr,FlexNet.CommunicationTypes)
member.summary: Sets the type of communication used for the connection to the activation server used for transactions.
member.param: An activation handle opened with flxActCommonHandleOpen.
The type of comms required. Set this in relation to the type of activation server.
member.returns: Returns True on success and False on failure. Call flxActCommonHandleGetError to find out the specific error.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.flxActCommonHandleGetCommType(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets the type of communication used for the connection to the activation server.
member.param: An activation handle opened with flxActCommonHandleOpen.
member.returns: The type of communcations required. Set this in relation to the type of activation server.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.flxActCommonHandleSetStatusCallback(System.IntPtr,FlexNet.CommonLibrary.StatusCallback,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Sets a callback that reports changes in status of transactions in progress on a SOAP connection.
member.param: An activation handle opened with flxActCommonHandleOpen.
Pointer to the callback function. See FLX_STATUS_CALLBACK for a typedef of this function.
Optional data passed to the callback function. This is input to the callback function as pUserData, see FLX_STATUS_CALLBACK for details.
member.returns: Returns True on success and False on failure. Call flxActCommonHandleGetError to find out the specific error.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.flxActCommonHandleSetProxyDetails(System.IntPtr,System.UInt64,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the proxy server details when using a SOAP connection.
member.param: An activation handle opened with flxActCommonHandleOpen.
The proxy server port number.
The name of the proxy server.
Optionally, when the proxy server requires authentication, a user name. Set this to NULL when authentication is not required.
Optionally, when the proxy server requires authentication, a password. Set this to NULL when authentication is not required.
member.returns: Returns True on success and False on failure. Call flxActCommonHandleGetError to find out the specific error.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.flxActCommonHandleGetLastOpsErrorString(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Gets text that explains the last error code returned by the FlexNet Operations server.
member.param: An activation handle opened with flxActCommonHandleOpen.
member.returns: The FlexNet Operations server error text or NULL if no error text is available.

member.name: M:FlexNet.CommonLibrary.Dispose

member.name: T:FlexNet.ProductLicenseSpecification
member.summary: Wrapper class for FlexNet Product License Specification object.

member.name: T:FlexNet.FlexObject
member.summary: Abstract base class for FlexNet handles. The various handle-based objects are all sub-classed off of this.

member.name: M:FlexNet.FlexObject.#ctor(FlexNet.CommonLibrary,FlexNet.FlexObject.CleanupDelegate)
member.param: CommonLibrary object used by sub-classes.
Delegate for the FlexNet function to call to delete the handle. Note that the delegate function is the actual CDecl function in the FlexNet DLL.

member.name: M:FlexNet.FlexObject.GetHandle
member.summary: Accessor function to access FlexNet handle.
member.returns: IntPtr object representing the FlexNet handle.

member.name: M:FlexNet.FlexObject.Dispose
member.summary: Deletes the Flex object if it exists.

member.name: M:FlexNet.FlexObject.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Calls the HandleDelete cleanup delegate function passed into the constructor, as long as that is non-null and the handle itself is non-zero.
member.param: Indicates whether this is being called from Dispose or from the destructor. Dispose uses true, and the destructor uses false. When set to true, all managed and unmanaged resources will be disposed. When set to false, only unmanaged resources will be disposed. Since the only resource in this abstract class is unmanaged, the value is ignored.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ProductLicenseSpecification.#ctor(FlexNet.CommonLibrary,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Creates a ProductLicenseSpecification based on the given handle. Note that unlike other handle wrapper classes, there is no deletion function for Product License Specification handles, so this class uses null for the Cleanup delegate.
member.param: A CommonLibrary object
A handle returned by .

member.name: M:FlexNet.ProductLicenseSpecification.IsDisabled
member.summary: See
member.returns: true if disabled false otherwise

member.name: M:FlexNet.ProductLicenseSpecification.ToString
member.summary: Format and output the contents of this product license specifcation.
member.returns: The formatted contents.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ProductLicenseSpecification.flxActCommonProdLicSpcFeatureLineGet(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Returns the number of fulfillment records in the license specification.
member.param: A product license specification that contains a fulfillment record.
member.returns: The activated feature lines from the fulfillment record, or NULL if not set.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ProductLicenseSpecification.flxActCommonProdLicSpcFulfillmentIdGet(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Returns the number of fulfillment records in the license specification.
member.param: A product license specification that contains a fulfillment record.
member.returns: The fulfillment ID from the fulfillment record or NULL if not set.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ProductLicenseSpecification.flxActCommonProdLicSpcTrustFlagsGet(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Get the trust status of the fulfillment record in the supplied product license specification.
member.param: A product license specification that contains a fulfillment record.
member.returns: The trust status from the fulfillment record or NULL if not set. See Discussion for an explanation of this value.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ProductLicenseSpecification.flxActCommonProdLicSpcFulfillmentTypeGet(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Get the fulfillment type from the fulfillment record in the supplied product license specification.
member.param: A product license specification that contains a fulfillment record.
member.returns: The type of "transaction" used to place this fulfillment record in trusted storage. For details of valid values, see flxFulfillmentType.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ProductLicenseSpecification.flxActCommonProdLicSpcProductIdGet(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Get the product ID from the fulfillment record in the supplied product license specification.
member.param: A product license specification that contains a fulfillment record.
member.returns: The product ID from the fulfillment record or NULL if not set.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ProductLicenseSpecification.flxActCommonProdLicSpcEntitlementIdGet(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Get the entitlement ID from the fulfillment record in the supplied product license specification.
member.param: A product license specification that contains a fulfillment record.
member.returns: The entitlement ID from the fulfillment record or NULL if not set.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ProductLicenseSpecification.flxActCommonProdLicSpcSuiteIdGet(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Get the suite ID from the fulfillment record in the supplied product license specification.
member.param: A product license specification that contains a fulfillment record.
member.returns: The suite ID from the fulfillment record or NULL if not set.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ProductLicenseSpecification.flxActCommonProdLicSpcExpDateGet(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Get the expiration date from the fulfillment record in the supplied product license specification.
member.param: A product license specification that contains a fulfillment record.
member.returns: The expiration date from the fulfillment record or NULL if not set. The format is dd-mmm-yyyy.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ProductLicenseSpecification.flxActCommonProdLicSpcIsDisabled(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Returns the status of the specified fulfillment record.

member.returns: true if disabled false otherwise

member.name: T:FlexNet.LicenseNotFoundException
member.summary: Raised when the there is no license (trusted storage is empty).

member.name: T:FlexNet.InvalidFeatureException
member.summary: Raised when a feature is not present in the trusted storage.

member.name: T:FlexNet.InvalidFeatureVersionException
member.summary: Raised when a feature does not have the correct version.

member.name: T:FlexNet.InvalidProductLicenseSpecification
member.summary: Raised when a license cannot be trusted (e.g: system clock has been changed, ...).

member.name: T:FlexNet.LicenseSpecification
member.summary: Wrapper class for FlexNet License Specification object.

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseSpecification.#ctor(FlexNet.CommonLibrary)
member.summary: Creates a license specification object. See description for more details.
member.param: A CommonLibrary object
member.exception: Throws a CreateLicenseSpecException on failure to create the license specification.

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseSpecification.PopulateFromTrustedStorage
member.summary: See .

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseSpecification.PopulateAllFromTrustedStorage
member.summary: See .

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseSpecification.GetNumberProducts
member.summary: See .

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseSpecification.GetProduct(System.Int32)
member.summary: See .
member.returns: ProductLicenseSpecification object created from the handle returned by flxActCommonLicSpcGet.

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseSpecification.flxActCommonLicSpcCreate(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: Creates a license specification. This is a structure that is used to contain and manipulate fulfillment records. A license specification may hold multiple fulfillment records: an individual fulfillment record is contained in a product license specification.
member.param: An activation handle opened with flxActCommonHandleOpen.
The resulting handle to the license specification.
member.returns: True on success and False on failure. Call flxActCommonHandleGetError to find out the specific error.

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseSpecification.flxActCommonLicSpcDelete(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Deletes the specified license specification. All resources associated with the license specification, including any fulfillment records it contains, are freed.
member.param: The resulting handle to the license specification.

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseSpecification.flxActCommonLicSpcPopulateFromTS(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Loads valid fulfillment records from trusted storage into the license specification.
member.param: A license specification created using flxActCommonLicSpcCreate.
member.returns: True on success and False on failure. Call flxActCommonHandleGetError to find out the specific error.

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseSpecification.flxActCommonLicSpcPopulateAllFromTS(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Loads all fulfillment records; expired and non-expired; valid and not valid, from trusted storage into the specified license specification.
member.param: A license specification created using flxActCommonLicSpcCreate.
member.returns: True on success and False on failure. Call flxActCommonHandleGetError to find out the specific error.

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseSpecification.flxActCommonLicSpcGetNumberProducts(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Returns the number of fulfillment records in the license specification.
member.param: A license specification created using flxActCommonLicSpcCreate.
member.returns: The number of fulfillment records in the license specification.

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseSpecification.flxActCommonLicSpcGet(System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the number of fulfillment records in the license specification.
member.param: A license specification created using flxActCommonLicSpcCreate.
The position of the desired fulfillment record where index is in the range 0 through count-1, with 0 being the first fulfillment record. Use flxActCommonLicSpcGetNumberProducts to determine count.
member.returns: If successful, the fulfillment record is returned in a product license specification object. If not successful, NULL is returned.

member.name: T:FlexNet.LicenseUtility
member.summary: For our use, we assume there is only one license.

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseUtility.GetLicensesExpirations
member.summary: Return a dictionnary of license name / expiration date pairs.

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseUtility.GetLicenseExpirationDate
member.summary: Return the expiration date. Null if no expiration date. If multiple licenses, get the furthest expiration date (expired or not expired).
member.returns: Null if no expiration date (permanent).

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseUtility.HasValidLicense
member.summary:
Check if there is a non expired license with the correct version. If not, a FlexeraException is raised.
It should only be used by applications that do not have specific feature. e.g: iisu Advanced Configuration, iisu LaunchPad, ...

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseUtility.GetFeatureExpireDays(System.String)
member.summary:
Get the number of days remaining of the latest expiring feature.
WARNING: Make sure you have called Check before calling GetFeatureExpireDays. This method does not check for invalid feature.
member.returns: The number of days left before expiration, null if permanent.

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseUtility.Check(System.String)
member.summary: Check if a feature is available (present, with the correct version and not expired).

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseUtility.Check(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: If any error occurs, an exception is thrown (InvalidFeatureException, InvalidFeatureVersionException, ...).

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseUtility.GetFeatureExpirationDate(System.String)
member.summary: Get the furthest expiration date.

member.name: M:FlexNet.LicenseUtility.GetFeatureExpirationDate(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieve all the Product License Specifications that contains featureName with or without the correct version.
member.param: If true, only takes licenses with the correct version

member.name: P:FlexNet.LicenseUtility.LicenseExpireDays
member.summary: Return the number of days before the furthest expiration of all licenses. Null if no expiration.

member.name: M:Iisu.Data.Vector3.CompareTo(Iisu.Data.Vector3)
member.summary: compares the magnitude of this instance against the magnitude of the supplied vector.
member.param: The vector to compare this instance with.
member.returns: Less than 0: The magnitude of this instance is less than the magnitude of point. Zero: The magnitude of this instance equals the magnitude of vector. Greater than 0: The magnitude of this instance is greater than the magnitude of point.

member.summary: Multiply component by component

member.summary: Do nothing.

member.summary: Multiply vector vec by f. Result is ( vec.X*f, vec.Y*f, vec.Z*f ).

member.summary: Multiply vector vec by f. Result is ( vec.X*f, vec.Y*f, vec.Z*f ).

member.name: M:Iisu.Data.Vector3.op_Division(Iisu.Data.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Divide vector vec by f. Result is ( vec.X/f, vec.Y/f, vec.Z/f ).

member.name: M:Iisu.Data.Vector3.op_Addition(Iisu.Data.Vector3,Iisu.Data.Vector3)
member.summary: Add two vectors. Result is ( a.X + b.X, a.Y + b.Y, a.Z + b.Z )

member.name: M:Iisu.Data.Vector3.op_Subtraction(Iisu.Data.Vector3,Iisu.Data.Vector3)
member.summary: Subtract two vectors. Result is ( a.X - b.X, a.Y - b.Y, a.Z - b.Z )

member.name: M:Iisu.Data.Vector3.Invert
member.summary: Invert the direction of the vector.

member.name: M:Iisu.Data.Vector3.Add(Iisu.Data.Vector3)
member.summary: Add 'vec' to self. Much quicker than using '+' operator since no new objects are created.

member.name: M:Iisu.Data.Vector3.Subtract(Iisu.Data.Vector3)
member.summary: Subtract 'vec' from self. Much quicker than using '-' operator since no new objects are created.

member.name: M:Iisu.Data.Vector3.Multiply(System.Single)
member.summary: Multiply self by 'scale'. Much quicker than using '*' operator since no new objects are created.

member.name: M:Iisu.Data.Vector3.Divide(System.Single)
member.summary: Divide self by 'divisor'. Much quicker than using '/' operator since no new objects are created.

member.summary: Get the vector with the greatest magnitude

member.name: M:Iisu.Data.Vector3.MaxXYZ(Iisu.Data.Vector3,Iisu.Data.Vector3)

member.name: T:Iisu.IApplicationConfigurator
member.summary: an object used to configure an iisu instance. ApplicationConfigurator can be created using the Iisu.Iisu.CreateConfigurator() factory method.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ActivationServiceInstaller.Install
member.summary: Called to install (or upgrade) the activation service. Should be called even if you want to register an interest in the service.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ActivationServiceInstaller.UnInstall
member.summary: Called to uninstall the activation service.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ActivationServiceInstaller.fnpActSvcInstallWin(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Called to install (or upgrade existing) system files. Should be called even if you want to register an interest in the services.
member.param: The name you assign to yourself as a publisher. This string can be anything meaningful to you and does not need to match your vendor name as registered with Flexera Software, Inc. This string cannot contain the comma character.

The name of the application. This name is used to identify the application is using the FlexNet Licensing Service. You should ensure that this value and the publisher name uniquely identify the application. This string can be anything meaningful to you. This string cannot contain the comma character.
member.returns: TRUE = Success, FALSE = Failure Call fnpActSvcGetLastErrorWin for additional return information for both successful and failed installs.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ActivationServiceInstaller.fnpActSvcUninstallWin(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Called to uninstall your use of the services. Using a reference counter it determines if the services should be removed from the system.
member.param: The name you assign to yourself as a publisher. This string can be anything meaningful to you and does not need to match your vendor name as registered with Flexera Software, Inc. This string cannot contain the comma character.

The name of the application. This name is used to identify the application that was using the FlexNet Licensing Service. You should ensure that this value and the publisher name uniquely identify the application. This string can be anything meaningful to you. This string cannot contain the comma character.
member.returns: TRUE = Success, FALSE = Failure Call fnpActSvcGetLastErrorWin for additional return information for both successful and failed uninstalls.

member.name: M:FlexNet.ActivationServiceInstaller.fnpActSvcGetLastErrorWin
member.summary: Returns additional information on the operation of the last Licensing Service API function called. Additional information is available both when the call succeeded and when it failed so this function does not, as its name implies, return only errors.
member.returns: ActSvrExtendedCodes

member.name: T:FlexNet.InstallationCodes
member.summary: Extended return codes, given by fnpActSvcGetLastErrorWin

member.name: T:Iisu.DeviceStatus
member.summary: Describes the differents states in which the device can be
